Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells are the most efficient energy devices, besides being environmentally friendly.
Titulo: High-density BaCe0.9Y0.1O3-δ obtained by solid-state reaction sintered at 1200 oC without sintering aid

Sentencas: However, the high operating temperatures restrict the deployment of these cells.
Titulo: High-density BaCe0.9Y0.1O3-δ obtained by solid-state reaction sintered at 1200 oC without sintering aid

Sentencas: Therefore, efforts have focused on decreasing these temperatures using proton conductors as electrolyte, such as perovskite-type oxides ABO(3).
Titulo: High-density BaCe0.9Y0.1O3-δ obtained by solid-state reaction sintered at 1200 oC without sintering aid

Sentencas: Among them, yttrium-doped barium cerate shows high conductivity.
Titulo: High-density BaCe0.9Y0.1O3-δ obtained by solid-state reaction sintered at 1200 oC without sintering aid

Sentencas: But also, is reported in the literature that BaCe0.9Ce0.1O3-delta has low sinterability, and high sintering temperatures are required to obtain ceramic bodies with 95% of theoretical density.
Titulo: High-density BaCe0.9Y0.1O3-δ obtained by solid-state reaction sintered at 1200 oC without sintering aid

Sentencas: In this work, powders were prepared by solid-state reaction through three procedures, and it was possible to obtain dense pellets of BaCe0.9Y0.1O3-delta at sintering temperature as low as 1200 oC without sintering aid.
Titulo: High-density BaCe0.9Y0.1O3-δ obtained by solid-state reaction sintered at 1200 oC without sintering aid

Sentencas: This makes it possible to manufacture the electrolyte by co-sintering with other cell components.
Titulo: High-density BaCe0.9Y0.1O3-δ obtained by solid-state reaction sintered at 1200 oC without sintering aid

Sentencas: It was determined that the microstructural development is assisted by liquid phase, intrinsic of the system, whose efficiency for promoting densification strongly depends on the particle size and the degree of powder aggregation.
Titulo: High-density BaCe0.9Y0.1O3-δ obtained by solid-state reaction sintered at 1200 oC without sintering aid

Sentencas: In addition, the influence of microstructure on the electrical properties at low temperatures confirmed the intrinsic liquid phase in specific grain boundary conductivities.
Titulo: High-density BaCe0.9Y0.1O3-δ obtained by solid-state reaction sintered at 1200 oC without sintering aid
